khan_etal_2022_im3gcamusa
  • Meta Repository

Citation

Khan, Z., Wolfram, P., Iyer, G., Rice, J., Vernon, C., Binsted, M., Graham, N. 2022. Coevolution of future water, energy and land systems across the United States in response to national and global socioeconomics, climate, and energy transitions. (In-Prep) Journal_TBD, DOI: XXXX


Models Used


Model Version Description Language Link
WRF
Climate simulation model
https://www.mmm.ucar.edu/weather-research-and-forecasting-model
GCAM gcam v5.3 (branch gcam-usa-im3) Global Change Analysis Model. Human-earth systems dynamic model. C++/R https://stash.pnnl.gov/projects/JGCRI/repos/gcam-core/browse?at=refs%2Fheads%2Fzk%2Ffeature%2Fgcam-usa-im3
Xanthos xanthos v2.4.1 Water runoff emulator at 0.5 degree grids and monthly timesteps. Python https://github.com/JGCRI/xanthos
Helios helios v1.0.0 Gridded Heating and cooling degree day calculator at multiple spatial and temporal resolution. R Helios
GGCMI ggcmi v1.0.0 Emulators to model agricultural yield impacts in response to climate ? GGCMI
rpackageutils rpackageutils v1.0.0 Utility functions to process, aggregate and reformat data. R https://github.com/JGCRI/rpackageutils
im3components im3components v1.0.0 Functions to process data between different IM3 models. R/Python https://github.com/IMMM-SFA/im3components
gcamextractor gcamextractor Model to extract and process data from GCAM output databases. R https://github.com/JGCRI/gcamextractor

Workflows Summary


Summary of experiment workflows.


Workflow 1 - Runoff


Workflow 1: Climate Impacts Runoff.


Workflow 1A US Basins


Table Workflow 1A


Workflow 1A results in WRF outputs being processed and run through Xanthos to produce runoff in mm per month for US Basins to be combined with Non-US Basins runoff results from Workflow 1B.


Step Description Location
WRF Outputs Raw
  • RCP 4.5, 8.5, hot and cool
  • hourly, 1979_01 to 2099_12
  • 12km x 12km resolution
  • Temperature (K)
  • Minimum temperature (K)
  • Wind speed (m/s)
  • Relative humidity (%)
  • GLW (W/m2)
  • SWDOWN (W/m2)
 (NERSC) /global/cfs/cdirs/m2702/gsharing
wrf_to_xanthos
  • wrf_to_xanthos_preprocess_historical.sh
  • wrf_to_xanthos_preprocess_ssp585_hot_near.sh
  • wrf_to_xanthos_preprocess_ssp585_hot_far.sh
  • wrf_to_xanthos_process_historical.sh
  • wrf_to_xanthos_process_ssp585_hot_near.sh
  • wrf_to_xanthos_process_ssp585_hot_far.sh
  • wrf_to_xanthos_combine_historical_ssp585_hot_near_far.sh
  • (NERSC) /global/cfs/cdirs/m2702/gcamusa/wrf_to_xanthos
  • (Repo) https://github.com/IMMM-SFA/khan-etal_2022_im3gcamusa/scripts
xanthos wrf_to_xanthos_combine_historical_ssp585_hot_near_far_us_global_xanthos.sh
  • (NERSC) /global/cfs/cdirs/m2702/gcamusa/wrf_to_xanthos
  • (NERSC) /global/cfs/cdirs/m2702/gcamusa/wrf_to_xanthos/xanthos_files/example/output
  • (Repo) https://github.com/IMMM-SFA/khan-etal_2022_im3gcamusa/scripts


Workflow 1B Global Basins


Table Workflow 1B


Step Description Location
CMIP5 Outputs Raw
  • RCP 4.5, 8.5
  • annualy, 1950 to 2099
  • 235 river basins
  • Basin runoff (km3/year)
 *(PIC) /pic/projects/im3/gcamusa/climateimpacts/raw_global_runoff_files
Xanthos Outputs on PIC runoff_global_xanthos_to_gcam.sh *(Repo) https://github.com/IMMM-SFA/khan-etal_2022_im3gcamusa/scripts
Xanthos GCAM GCM Sensitivity Analysis gcamDiagnostics_runoff_GCMs_5trail_delta.sh (PIC) /pic/projects/im3/gcamusa/diagnostics /pic/projects/im3/gcamusa/diagnostics/outputs_runoff_GCMs_5trail_delta
Xanthos GCAM smoothing Sensitivity Analysis gcamDiagnostics_runoff_NORESM_smooth_delta.sh (PIC) /pic/projects/im3/gcamusa/diagnostics /pic/projects/im3/gcamusa/diagnostics/outputs_runoff_NORESM_smooth_delta

Workflow 1C US and Global


Table Workflow 1C


Step Description Location
Workflow 1A Outputs Runoff mm per month for US Basins.
  • /pic/projects/im3/gcamusa/climateimpacts/runoff/outputs_workflow1a
  • Copied from (NERSC) /global/cfs/cdirs/m2702/gcamusa/wrf_to_xanthos/xanthos_files/example/output
Workflow 1B Outputs Runoff mm per month for Non-US Basins.
  • /pic/projects/im3/gcamusa/climateimpacts/raw_global_runoff_files
Combine US and Non-US runoff
  • xanthos_process_us_global_ssp585hotter_gcmChosen.sh
  • xanthos_combine_us_global_ssp585hotter_gcmChosen.R
  • /pic/projects/im3/gcamusa/climateimpacts/runoff
Extrapolate 2099 to 2100
  • xanthos_extrapolate_2099to2100_ssp585hotter_gcmChosen.R
  • /pic/projects/im3/gcamusa/climateimpacts/runoff
Smoothing
  • xanthos_smooth5trail_2099to2100_ssp585hotter_gcmChosen.R
  • /pic/projects/im3/gcamusa/climateimpacts/runoff
Convert to XML
  • xanthos_convert2xml_ssp585hotter_gcmChosen.R
  • /pic/projects/im3/gcamusa/climateimpacts/runoff
Run GCAM scenario rcp85hotter_ssp5
  • Run GCAM using rcp85hotter_ssp5 runoff.
  • /pic/projects/im3/gcamusa/gcam-usa-im3/exe
  • gcam_parallel_im3.sh
  • configuration_rcp85hotter_ssp5.xml
